Headline: #35 31st/35th Temporary Reroute near 35th/Shields
ShortDescription: 35 31st/35th buses rerouted EB via 35th, Wallace, 33rd, Wentworth & 35th; WB via 35th, LaSalle, 33rd, Wallace & 35th due to street blockage near 35th/Shields.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#35 31st/35th buses temporarily rerouted in both directions due to street blockage near 35th/Shields.

  • Eastbound buses will operate via 35th, Wallace, 33rd, Wentworth and 35th.
  • Westbound buses will operate via  35th, LaSalle, 33rd, Wallace and 35th.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #152 Addison Temporary Reroute at Addison/Narragansett
ShortDescription:
152 Addison buses are temporarily rerouted via Addison, Oak Park, Belmont, Austin, 
and Addison due to, street blockage at Addison/Narragansett.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
152 Addison buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions  via Addison, Oak Park, Belmont, Austin, and Addison due to, street blockage at Addison/Narragansett.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #86 Narragansett/Ridgeland Temporary Reroute at Addison/Narragansett
ShortDescription: 86 Narragansett/Ridgeland buses are temporarily rerouted via Narragansett, Belmont, Austin, Irving Pk, and Narragansett at Addison/Narragansett.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#86 Narragansett/Ridgeland buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Narragansett, Belmont, Austin, Irving Park, and Narragansett due to street blockage at Addison/Narragansett.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #J14 Jeffery Jump and #15 Jeffery Local Temporary Northbound Reroute near Jeffrey/Anthony
ShortDescription: J14 Jeffery Jump and 15 Jeffery Local buses are temporarily rerouted via Jeffrey, 85th and Anthony due to street blockage near Jeffrey/Anthony.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #J14 Jeffery Jump and #15 Jeffery Local buses are temporarily rerouted via Jeffrey, 85th and Anthony due to street blockage near Jeffrey/Anthony.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
